name: Buns: Bunny Survivor
description:
Help the magical bunny girl to survive for 10 minutes against hordes of evil. Collect gems to get new skills, find bunnies to heal, carrots to recharge.

This is tiny roguelike bullet heaven with a bunny girl made for Pico-8 fantasy console.

Features:
- incredibly crisp 128x128 resoltuion
- an explosion of color with a massive palette of 16 whole colors!
- super hard game, can be beaten in 10 minutes but it will be impossible, some players played it for 100+ hours!
- don't need mouse to play
- cute bunny
- CARROTS
